text: Khorne looked upon slaurith's first slaughter from his Skull Throne and smiled, the Bloodfather sending down his dark blessings upon Abrax and claiming him as a new champion
The sagas record slaurith falling upon entire warbands with screams of hate and rage, exterminating the lesser warriors as easily as he did the villages that happened to lie in his path
His mind shattered from the horrors he had witnessed and his body overflowing with infernal might, slaurith wandered a random path guided by whim or instinct to yet greater glory.
Only the few are considered the personal retinue of Lord Slaurith, the fiercest of Khornates.
